events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team will review all submissions carefully.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department due to your experience in software development and devops.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your profile. They will guide you through the next steps.
Your initial screening interview has been completed successfully. The recruiter noted your strong background and communication skills.
Thank you for responding promptly and expressing your enthusiasm for the technical interview phase scheduled next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 24th at 2 PM UTC. Prepare to discuss software design and devops scenarios.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating excellent problem-solving skills and development expertise.
Your HR interview is now scheduled for May 28th. This will focus on cultural fit and discussing benefits.
The HR interview was completed positively. The team appreciated your professionalism and alignment with company values.
We have extended a job offer for the Software Engineer role. Please review the offer letter sent to your email.
Thank you for accepting our offer. We are excited to welcome you aboard and will begin the onboarding process shortly.
Your onboarding has started. You will receive access credentials, training schedules, and introduction meetings soon.
The hiring process is now complete. Welcome officially to the team as a Software Engineer. We look forward to your contributions.
